attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes of supporting our loving president and keeping myself updated with an unbiased news source and as soon as i opened it i was met with an ad for a horrific porn site! and then i closed the app and opened an article and what do you know. an ad for milfs in my area! i dont know what that means but the picture was absolutely SCANDALOUS i was horrified. my family has family sharing on so the app automatically downloaded on all our devices, and my poor sixteen year old son was exposed to this absolutely disgusting content. i would have never expected something so perverse or traumatizing from our great president. i will now be voting for biden.
attributes.title: disgusting!

attributes.review:
SHREK
                         Once upon a time there was a lovely 
                         princess. But she had an enchantment 
                         upon her of a fearful sort which could 
                         only be broken by love's first kiss. 
                         She was locked away in a castle guarded 
                         by a terrible fire-breathing dragon. 
                         Many brave knights had attempted to 
                         free her from this dreadful prison, 
                         but non prevailed. She waited in the 
                         dragon's keep in the highest room of 
                         the tallest tower for her true love 
                         and true love's first kiss. (laughs) 
                         Like that's ever gonna happen. What 
                         a load of - (toilet flush)
  GINGERBREAD MAN
                         God bless us, every one.

                                     DONKEY
                         (as he's done singing and we fade to 
                         black) Oh, that's funny. Oh. Oh. I can't 
                         breathe. I can't breathe.
 
               THE END
attributes.title: God bless

attributes.review:
So while i was walking my disabled rat ( he only has two legs I kinda have to drag him) 🥴I came across this app. When i opened it i was appalled at by the image i saw. 😲It was of a big cheeto man! I simply wanted this app to keep up with the
big man himself 🥳but it was too laggy and I got bored.😴 I also can’t stand that face, i mean who wants to look at it. 😳Back to my rat, i showed my rat and he lost another leg because he was so scared of that orange. 🍊HOW DARE HE SCARE MY RAT!!!😡 My friend also downloaded this app and quickly deleted it and now she has nightmares every night and has to go to therapy three times a week.👁👄👁  All I have to say is keep hiding in ur bunker u nasty troll!!!🧚‍♂️✨💕
attributes.title: TRUMP 2020... on a gravestone✨

attributes.review: This app is very offending to anyone who isn’t a white conservative. How is a president going to be so racist. The logo of the app makes me want to throw up and it made my pet rock run away. This app deserves 0 stars. I honestly would rather step in a bucket of legos instead of looking at this horrendous app. Instead of having this stupid app we should download an app to arrest the offices that killed Breonna Taylor and Elija McClain. This app promotes the opposite of what America is supposed to be as stated in the pledge of allegiance “and justice for all”. There is no justice whatsoever. Kinda sad that the administration is scared of gen z. Y’all some cowards🥴 take this app down of my pet rock is coming for y’all 🤢BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.title: My pet rock ran away bc of this app

attributes.review: Sorry trump but if u want to ban our app then we will get rid of yours!!!!!! So there for everyone on TikTok is leaving bad reviews on this app so it will get deleted since u want to ban TikTok now all of this can stop if u just don’t ban TikTok it is the only app that kids teens and adults fine actually entertaining plz plz plz don’t ban TikTok it means everything to us so if u refuse then we will keep leaving bad reviews so this app will get deleted now trump I really like u as president but this is a new lowwww plz stop we really want TikTok to stay🥺🙏 and just because the Chinese invented TikTok and they gave us the coronavirus does not mean TickTok should be banned just please don’t ban TikTok plz plz plz 🥺🥰❤️🙏
attributes.title: We won’t TikTok to stay

attributes.review: you know, i wanted to download this app to get the REAL news. i have no tolerance for the FAKE NEWS media!! however, upon opening, i discovered that this app provides nothing but FAKE NEWS! i’ve seen claims that we have been handling the coronavirus pandemic well, and i have to disagree because we have over 130,000 deaths and over 3 million cases. second of all, this app is run by a team who thinks a reality tv person makes a good president- so i have some questions for those people. finally, i came understand that this man is a racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, misogynistic, xenophobic, anti-immigration nonsense-spewer, and if you support him, you are too!! 💋
attributes.title: this is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded

attributes.title: Mickey J

attributes.review:
Now I’m not one for hating on apps, but let me tell y’all, this ain’t no app, it’s an 𝙖𝙗𝙤𝙢𝙞𝙣𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣💅🏾. When I first opened this monstrosity I was disappointed, yet surprisingly not surprised, to see good ol’ bunker boy💜💋😝✨💕 on the front cover. For someone who loves to show their face, you didn’t seem to keep that same energy during protests for equality🥱🙈 But that’s not even the worst part!😭 when I tried to get out of the app to evidently delete it, it gave me a virus that led to 10 hours of non-stop h̾o̾r̾s̾e̾ n̾o̾i̾s̾e̾s̾.😒 I was just 𝕒𝕡𝕡𝕒𝕦𝕝𝕖𝕕. So I decided to see your ᴀɴɢᴇʀ ʟᴇᴠᴇʟ. And so, here we are! I hope you decide to reconsider your app for greater good all of us🥳

Signed,
Ivanka Trump
attributes.title: 𝙊𝙝 𝙩𝙤 𝙨𝙚𝙚 𝙬𝙞𝙩𝙝𝙤𝙪𝙩 𝙢𝙮 𝙚𝙮𝙚𝙨👁👄👁

attributes.title: Stream More and More

attributes.review: I would like to start off by my rating of this app of one star and if I could I would rate it less than one🤢. As soon as I opened the app I was violently violated 🦜and disgusted at the images that popped up, a cheeto riding a donkey🤮, a dead rat 🐄with a human eating it and a lizard with flies😬. It scared me so much that I 🐩dropped my phone into my toilet and caused it to clog and the water splashed onto my face which caused me to have an allergic 🦚reaction. So now I have a clogged toilet,👨🏼‍🦰 a medical bill from the ER 👙(from my rash and red bum) and a wet face all 🧤because of this app. ☘️Don’t buy it. It will only ruin your life and your face and your bills. Make the right choice and don’t buy it! Thanks.👾😹😻😿
attributes.title: Profusely Disgusting
